name: LinkBucks.com - Annoyance / Ads Remover
description:
Removes Annoyances from linkbucks.com image hosting.  Makes the annoying countdown skip button take up the whole screen, so it is easier to click and skip the ads

Features:
+ Larger font for the "Skip ads" button


Style's Idea:
-This style was suggested to me.  Please continue suggesting websites for me to style, I especially enjoy styling a dark website to white.

Changelog:
1.0.0.1:
+ Added Before/After Screenshots
